WorkItem.Description:
I just downloaded the 2.3.11 version after having used previous versions successfully.
 
I downloaded my character from the armory, fixed the pet, talents, shot priority/rotation (am a hunter) and the dps shows significantly off (like 4k off) 
 
I then went and did an open on a previous saved xml file that I've used in the past for offline tinkering, changed it to my correct gear, and the dps appeared appropriate.
 
Just to double check, I went and manually selected the components to avoid the download, and it's still obtaining the screwy (~1600 dps) values instead of the correct values.
 
Any thoughts?
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] DPS way off looks like a bug or something

Comments.Message: This has been fixed for next release. You can import a 2.3.10 saved version into 2.3.11 has a temp fix. See Issues 16624 and 16628 for more info. Also 16601 and16653 for additional information.

I brought my priest in and did 2 methods of optimizing for haste - both by haste rating and haste %. The suggested regemming was suppose to double my current haste but none of the gems were haste gems. I tried it out just to be sure - and sure enough no difference in my haste rating. Hugely disappointed!

Treyya, please post an issue of your own; sounds like you're misunderstanding or misconfiguring something. Regardless, it's unrelated to this issue. Please be sure to post the complete picture of information, so that we can actually help you out. See the posting guidelines.
thanks for the update - i'll keep updating my previous saved version for the time being (until the next release is out)
